name: Adventures of Winola the Witch
description:
In this fun 2D platformer game, you control Winola the Witch on her adventures, where she will face fun and challenging enemies and environments.

v0.1.0.3 known issues:

- Sometimes, when jumping near a small ledge, the player may get hanging from it, standing seemingly on thin air

- player projectiles pass through enemies & ground

- enemies can´t currently be damaged by anything
